notes: From doi_validation.py cleanup pipeline: (1) Unescape HTML entities (& -> &), (2) Strip query params (remove ?via%3Dihub&utm=source), (3) Strip fragments (remove #article-metadata), (4) Validate against pattern. Order matters: unescape first to handle cases like '&utm=source'. PDF section 7.4 reports 98.9% recovery rate even for complex cases.
